channel.title: Someone please help me? hacker messing up my server!
channel.description: I just put my server up today and some guy logged in. He wanted to be staff or else he would ruin my server.. He made a bunch of accounts that spammed my server! I asked him to stop... lol, like that did anything. He claims to have all my files, I tried to ban him and ipban, but i dont know if i did it wright. He keeps logging in when I start my server! Someone please tell me how could i get rid of him for good??? and stop those spammers! Please, please!!

item.title: Someone please help me? hacker messing up my server!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

No… He doesn’t. He’s just using a program to create many connections to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone please help me? hacker messing up my server!

item.title: Someone please help me? hacker messing up my server!
item.dc:creator: @cheeksahoy cheeksahoy
item.description:
@cheeksahoy wrote:

Ok, thank you and rep+ if i could…

Do you think he really has my files?

Read full topic

item.title: Someone please help me? hacker messing up my server!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It’s SYIPkPker. Allow only one connection per IP.

Follow this tutorial.
